TASK: Navigate to example.com
DOMAIN: browser

STEPS:
1. Open the Start menu to access applications
   REASONING: Need to launch a web browser (Chrome or Edge) to navigate to the website
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu animation to complete and become interactive
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type the browser name to search for it
   REASONING: Quickly locate the web browser application (using Chrome as the default browser)
   ACTION: TYPE("chrome")

4. Wait for search results to populate
   REASONING: Give the system time to find and display matching applications
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

5. Click on Google Chrome from the search results
   REASONING: Launch the browser application to begin web navigation
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.1, y=0.3)

6. Wait for Chrome to fully load
   REASONING: Browser needs time to initialize and display the main window with address bar
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Click on the address bar at the top of the browser
   REASONING: Need to activate the address bar to enter the URL
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.05)

8. Wait for address bar to become active
   REASONING: Ensure the address bar is focused and ready for text input
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

9. Type the website URL
   REASONING: Enter the destination URL to navigate to example.com
   ACTION: TYPE("example.com")

10. Press Enter to navigate to the website
    REASONING: Submit the URL to initiate navigation to example.com
    ACTION: HOTKEY("return")

11. Wait for the webpage to load
    REASONING: Allow time for the browser to connect to the server and render the example.com page
    ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

12. Task completed successfully
    REASONING: The browser has navigated to example.com and the page is displayed
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: Google Chrome browser is open and displaying the example.com website, with the URL "example.com" visible in the address bar and the Example Domain page content loaded and visible in the browser window.
